name: Ticking Away
description:
You are young and life is long, and there is time to kill today
And then one day you find ten years have got behind you
No one told you when to run, you missed the starting gun
- Time by Pink Floyd

In 2017, I had the opportunity to photograph activities in juvenile prison. I don't consider them dangerous, although some of them have been charged with murder. Seeing them in that place, I just saw a group of people waiting for time to go home and return to their respective families.

*This piece is a form of collaboration with MetaFunnel for the #MFdrop event. Collect this and get the chance to grab the prize!
